_meta.note: Backfilled with LMNT proxy data from 03B VOC (31 quotes at saturation). ALL DATA IS LMNT PROXY — not IonWave customer data. Must be validated/replaced with IonWave-specific interviews post-launch.
_meta.upgrade_path: Conduct 5-10 IonWave-specific customer interviews to replace proxy data

pain_points.implication: Product opportunity: marine plasma natural mineral balance; position as 'all the electrolytes, none of the salt bomb'

pain_points.sample_quote: over $500 a year just for an electrolyte drink (LMNT-013)
pain_points.implication: Price positioning: 10-15% below Seaonic per thesis; ensure beats LMNT $/serving for daily users
Test marine plasma tolerance on empty stomach; if better, this is a differentiator
Ensure fulfillment reliable from Day 1; table stakes

jobs_to_be_done.job: Sustained daily energy without caffeine dependency
jobs_to_be_done.our_opportunity: HIGHEST — LMNT weakest here; marine plasma wellness story fits

jobs_to_be_done.job: Prevent keto flu / maintain electrolyte balance on restricted diet
jobs_to_be_done.current_solution: LMNT, DIY salt water, magnesium supplements
jobs_to_be_done.our_opportunity: HIGH — strong VOC validation; keto community is accessible
jobs_to_be_done.source: ICP JTBD analysis + LMNT-007, LMNT-010, LMNT-013

jobs_to_be_done.job: Peak cognitive + physical performance throughout day
jobs_to_be_done.our_opportunity: MODERATE — competes with broad supplement market, not just electrolytes

jobs_to_be_done.job: Identity expression — 'I optimize, therefore I am'
jobs_to_be_done.current_solution: LMNT brand, Seaonic for marine purists
jobs_to_be_done.our_opportunity: MODERATE — requires brand equity IonWave doesn't yet have

segment_insights.key_insight: Strongest validated segment; keto flu relief is acute, recurring pain point; community-driven discovery
Demands evidence and 'best-in-class' positioning; will research before buying
Performance improvement validated; high volume subscription-friendly; competes in LMNT territory
Energy/wellness job validated; highest strategic opportunity per JTBD; least 'electrolyte-aware'
No validated evidence; highest price sensitivity; highest DIY substitute risk

surprising_findings: LMNT's dominant pain is TASTE (19.4%), not price. Customers tolerate price but actively work around saltiness.
Customers self-dose at 50% — half-packets, 2x dilution. Market says: 'too much sodium.'
Daily wellness job is underserved by everyone. LMNT=sport, Seaonic=purity, Quinton=pharma. Nobody owns daily wellness.
LMNT customer service is genuinely excellent — raises the bar for IonWave.
Biohackers treat electrolytes as IDENTITY products, not commodity supplements.

marketing_quotes.source_expression: Killed my keto flu symptoms in one day (LMNT-007)

marketing_quotes.ionwave_angle: What if your morning water actually woke you up?

marketing_quotes.source_expression: jarringly salty / super salty sewage (LMNT-001, LMNT-004)
marketing_quotes.ionwave_angle: All the minerals. None of the salt bomb.

marketing_quotes.source_expression: health benefits make it worth every penny (LMNT-014)
marketing_quotes.ionwave_angle: 78 minerals from the ocean. Worth it.
